original_text: If a woman refuses to cover her head, she should cut off her hair. But, if a woman has no hair, or she has very short hair, she becomes very ashamed. So it is better that she should cover her head in your meetings.
korean_text: 만일 여자가 머리를 가리지 않거든 깎을 것이요 만일 깎거나 미는 것이 여자에게 부끄러움이 되거든 가릴지니라

sentences.original_text: If a woman refuses to cover her head
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 한 여자가 그녀의 머리를 가리는 것을 거부한다면

sentences.original_text: she should cut off her hair
But, if a woman has no hair
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나, 만약 한 여자에게 머리카락이 없다면

sentences.original_text: or she has very short hair
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그녀에게 아주 짧은 머리카락이 있다면

sentences.original_text: So it is better that she should cover her head
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그녀가 그녀의 머리를 가리는 것이 더 낫다
